description: This is the best browser on the market for power users. So many tools to make your workflow unique and easier.

I am using the latest version of Bazzite on the steam deck and so far it has been working insanely well, I am genuinely happy they went through with making a flatpak version of vivaldi. Reason being ever since i used firefox i have just been getting corruption in youtube videos for some reason that fixes itself when you FFW about 5 seconds... With Vivaldi i haven't had to do any of that nonsense... only minor issue is when i full screen onto youtube it originally has a black screen but simply pressing escape and fullscreen once more it fixes itself.
It is really great for me . Dark mode is very good
summary: Debian 12 Working good and does not crash

description: Vivaldi Flatpak, been waiting on this for a long time.
Vivaldi, the ultimate browser, email, calendar, feed, social software for all your devices.
Vivaldi for Windows and Android is pretty impressive. The Linux version seems to suffer from instability, but I'm more than willing to tolerate that for what's on offer.

Vivaldi is a very compentent browser. It features tab management features including Workspaces (grouped tabs) and Stacked tabs within those workspaces. It treats Linux like a first class platform like it does with other operating systems. 

Vivaldi is privacy focused and comes bundled with an ad and tracker blocker. Basically, Vivaldi feels a lot like Brave but without the Crypto BS and the problematic founder. In fact, the founder of Vivaldi seems chill enough for a tech guy. I've been using it on Fedora Kinoite and it feels like it integrates well with the look and feel of Plasma. I only wish that their menu would appear in the Global Menu like it does on MacOS, then it would really feel like it integrates with Plasma perfectly!

I'm running an immutable distro so it was always a hassle to set up distrobox to simply get the browser. Plus it didn't feel like a clean solution. The flatpak makes things so much easier.

I encountered no issues with it. Even things like GPU acceleration work fine. Hope the Vivaldi team officially adopt this soon!

Vivaldi is full of features and has the Speed DIal page, which makes accessing websites I access daily very intuitive. It also has a built-in e-mail client, calendar, support for taking notes and cross-device synchronization. I really recommend it.
Glad this web browser is finally on Flathub! My only gripe is that it doesn't track the system theme, instead always using the light theme. For now, I've just set the default to dark.
Good browser for fedora linux

Flatpack version does not seem to see priters - all permissions in flatpack set but only PDF option is available. Firefox with the same permissions works fine. Deb version downloaded from Vivaldi site is fine too.
The best browser there is.

This browser's only drawbacks are that it's not (fully) open-source and chromium-based. 

Otherwise this browser is great:

- uses little resources + optional "hiberante all tabs" option
- tab management with stacking & workspaces
- ui can be full of stuff or extremely minimalistic
- ngl vanilla Vivaldi is ugly, but there are enough themes to choose from
- mouse gestures that work better on Vivaldi than any extension I've ever tried
- in general: so many (optional) features, you can basically customise it to be a browser made for you

Vivaldi is a great browser, especially since it support vertical tabs and is not Edge. However, recently they've made an update that has broken Nvidia on Wayland. Previously, by enabling the Ozone setting to Wayland or "Auto", any flickering issues would be resolved. However, this is no longer the case.

While the browser is stunning and nice, it's closed source. People should be more concerned about this. They can say they have good intentions and promise you the world, but you don't actually know the truth. Just use Brave for Chromium Open Source, or Firefox (Waterfox, Librewolf or Floorp).

Vivaldi es un navegador que se enfoca en la personalización y la privacidad. Ofrece temas y atajos de teclado personalizados,barra lateral así como otras herramientas integradas. Un navegador con sólidas protecciones de privacidad y seguridad integradas.

Un navegador poderoso, personal y privado que se adapta a tu estilo de vida.
Es un navegador que tiene de todo y muy productivo, funciona impecable y que además podamos contar con su distribución en flatpak es un sueño hecho realidad
summary: La navaja suiza de los navegadores

description: es un navegador muy productivo, aunque no pude importar mis datos de google chrome, pero aún así, excelente navegador web.

Un navegador para todo lo que quieras y configurable en todo lo imaginable. Para los que nos gusta tenerlo todo personalizado es el mejor. Pero no solo navegador, también correo-e, calendario, feeds... No hay otro como él
Je le préfère en tout point par rapport a Firefox ou d'autres navigateurs web
SUSE 15.5 .Не работает.
Отлично, давно ждали в формате flatpak! Так держать

создатель первой оперы смог откреститься от более чем пятидесят нарушений конфедициальности, содержащихся в лицензии гугла на движок. В этом браузере безопасность не в затычках, а в принципе. Плюс традиции и мною любимый почтовый клиент. Удобство в закладках и насыщенность инструментами не через сторонние расширения.
Последняя версия, вкладки не закрываются, лечится только закрытием браузера, безопасность на уровне хрома.
Много лет уже с этим браузером и это лучший представитель браузеров, чего только жесты управления стоят и гибкость настройки
